notFound.main: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found

dashboard.intro:
TripBot is a bot develped by Moonbear of TripSit with the goal of providing harm reduction tools to the greater discord universe.
The bot is prepetually in BETA mode, and is subject to change at any time, but we do our best to not cause problems.
This page is brand-new (May 9th 2023) and there are not a lot of web-developers on the team, so it's super basic.
Think you can make a better page? Please do! Check out the Help Wanted section in the sidebar.

banAppeal.reason: Do you know why you were banned? (Required)
banAppeal.solution: Have you taken any steps to rectify the situation or make amends for the behavior that lead to the ban?
banAppeal.solutionPlaceholder: What have you done to fix the situation?
banAppeal.future: What steps will you take to ensure that you do not repeat the behavior that lead to the ban?
banAppeal.futurePlaceholder: Assure the team that there won't be any issues in the future
banAppeal.extra: Is there anything else you would like to add? (Optional)
banAppeal.extraPlaceholder: Anything else you want to say?
banAppeal.emailPlaceholder: If you no longer share any guild with TripBot, the bot will not be able to message you with status updates on your appeal (accepted OR rejected). In this case, please provide your email.
